boardgame.description: The characters of Alice's Adventures in Wonderland are having a Parade!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;All players are producers of this parade. Characters from Lewis Carroll's books such as Alice, The White Rabbit, and The Hatter are steadily invited to join this weird procession._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On your turn, you play a card (from your hand of five) to the end of the parade. Unfortunately, that card might cause other cards to walk off the parade. These cards count as negative points in the end._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The length of the parade line is important. If the number of the card you just played is less than the line length, you may receive the excess cards (counting from last played to the first of the line). But you don't take all the relevant cards, only the cards that meet one of these requirements:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1. the color is the same as color of the card just played, or _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2. the number is the same or lower than the card just played_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends when the draw deck is exhausted or when one player has collected all six colors in their point piles. Then everyone plays one last card. From the four cards remaining in their hand, players choose two cards to add to his or her point piles. The player who has the least negative points after this is the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Scoring:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Normally, negative points are same the number on the card. But if you have the most cards in a certain color, each of your cards of that color counts as only 1 negative point!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Thus, play your cards well!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Japon Brand - Alice in Wonderland: Parade Language: English, German _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Japanese Players: 2 to 6 Age: 10+ Duration: about 30 min Weight:

Z-Man Games (ZMG 4065) The parade has started in Wonderland. Everybody is dressed up, the streets are decorated, excitement is in the air. Let’s find more people to join the parade. You are one of the organizers of the parade and are constantly trying your best to encourage people to join. If only the people already taking part didn’t leave so early... After a short while they just lose any interest in the parade. And if somebody shows up with the same dress or of higher rank, all they do is to leave the parade immediately and complain to you. You just want everybody to have fun, but why is that so difficult? A quirky card game originally published in Japan.
Uk 1st class £1.75 Europe £2.40

Zman Games - Parade Language: English Players: 2-6 Age: 10+ Duration: about 30 min Weight: 0.120 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: The characters of Alice in Wonderland are having a Parade! All players are producers of this parade. Characters from Lewis Carroll_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s books such as Alice, The White Rabbit, and The Mad Hatter are steadily invited to join this weird procession. On your turn, you play a card (from your hand of five) to the end of the parade. Unfortunately, that card might cause other cards to walk off the parade. These cards will count as negative points in the end. The length of parade line is important. If the number of the card you just played is greater than the line length, you may receive the excess cards (counting from last played to the first of the line). But you do not take all cards, only the cards that meet one of these requirements: color is same as just played, or number is same or lower than just played. The game ends when all cards are played or when one player has collected all six colors in their point piles. Then everyone plays one last card. From the four cards remaining in their hand, they choose two cards to add to their point piles. The player who has the least negative points after this is the winner. Scoring: Normally, negative points are same the number on the card. But if you have the most cards in a certain color, each of your cards of that color counts only 1 negative point!Thus, play your cards well! See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
Complete. Cards have slight wear. Shipping is $5, or free with purchase of a game with higher shipping costs.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 4065) The parade has started in Wonderland. Everybody is dressed up, the streets are decorated, excitement is in the air. Let’s find more people to join the parade. You are one of the organizers of the parade and are constantly trying your best to encourage people to join. If only the people already taking part didn’t leave so early... After a short while they just lose any interest in the parade. And if somebody shows up with the same dress or of higher rank, all they do is to leave the parade immediately and complain to you. You just want everybody to have fun, but why is that so difficult? A quirky card game originally published in Japan.

*** 4th Dimension Games *** Parade: $6.49 In Stock (7% sales tax for residents of Pennsylvania) This is a New, Sealed in Box Parade card game. Publisher: Z-Man Games [ZMG4065] Number of Players: 2-6 Ages: 10+ Length: 30 minutes Shipping: Shipping rates will be determined upon sale or request. Insurance is optional but highly recommended for higher priced items. The shipping costs are NOT inflated. You pay exactly what I am charged for shipping, along with material costs. I ship through FedEx or USPS, whichever is cheaper. Normal shipping costs for this game run from $3.00 - $6.00. If you have a commercial address that I can send to, your shipping costs will be even less! Payment: I accept PayPal, money orders, personal and cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s checks. Personal checks will be accepted but I will wait until the check has cleared before sending the item. Return Policy: I want you to be completely satisfied with your item. Because of this, I will accept return of any item for a refund of the purchase price within 30 days of the sale. The item must be in the same condition that it was sent. I cannot refund the shipping cost.
Brand New! A portion of the earnings from each sale are donated to St. Jude Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Research Hospital. Standard Shipping to USA48: $3.95
